snippet.title: The Elder Scrolls: Castles - Developer Deep Dive
snippet.description:
Castles is the spiritual successor to Fallout Shelter, the popular vault-building mobile game that puts you in the role of an Overseer. In Castles, you’ll take on the role of the right hand of the king (or queen) and manage your kingdom. You’ll build the castle of your dreams, rule over your subjects, and make critical decisions about your kingdom’s future as you build your dynasty.  

Get ready to go down in Tamriel’s history books because The Elder Scrolls: Castles launches globally on September 10!  

Stay up-to-date on the latest news by visiting https://elderscrolls.bethesda.net/castles and following Castles on social: 
Twitter/X: twitter.com/TESCastles 
Instagram: instagram.com/TESCastles 
Discord: discord.gg/bethesdastudios
